translation.en: ♪ Let the light scream out From the high beams ♪
I read that this is how Xavier Woods gets Kofi out of bed before a big match.
translation.it: Ho letto che è così che Xavier Woods fa alzare Kofi dal letto prima dei match.

translation.en: [laughing] You did not read that, Grandma.
Ah! Okay, okay! I'm up, I'm up, I'm up.
-All right, kiddo. Time to wake up. -I'm up, Dad.
translation.it: - È ora di alzarsi. - Sono sveglio, papà.

translation.en: [Denise] And when you get home from school, clean that room.
translation.it: E quando torni da scuola, pulisci la tua stanza.

translation.en: Thank you. Any chance you made breakfast, Denise?
translation.it: Grazie. Hai anche preparato la colazione?

translation.en: "Monday is one step closer to Friday."
translation.it: "Lunedì siam già più vicini a venerdì."
Sei su Instagram? Sì! Ho 300 follower.

translation.en: Your grandma's about to be an influencer.
Can you do me a favor
-and not flirt with my t-shirts? -I will second that.
translation.it: - non flirtare con le mie maglie. - Già.

translation.en: All right, all right. I'm working on myself.
-So, are we gonna watch Raw tonight? -You know it.
Okay. Well, in that case, I will see you later.
All right, I love you. Have a good day at school.
translation.it: Ti voglio bene. Buona giornata a scuola.

translation.en: -How late were you driving that Lyft? -Mmm.
translation.it: Hai fatto tardi guidando per Lyft?

translation.en: that now I get to go to my second job.
translation.it: è che ora posso andare al lavoro.

translation.en: [sighs] Steve, it seems like you're burning the candle at both ends. You look tired.
translation.it: Steve, stai tirando la corda. Hai l'aria stanca.

translation.en: But I gotta do what I gotta do.
And I can fix cars in my sleep.
translation.it: E poi so riparare le auto anche dormendo.

translation.en: Well, don't work on anybody's brakes today.
translation.it: Beh, oggi non lavorare sui freni.

translation.en: [Riyaz] Hey, you guys see WWE's feed this morning?
translation.it: Avete visto la diretta della WWE?

translation.en: What do you guys think the announcement is gonna be?
Personally, I hope it's something to do with them looking for a new director.
translation.it: Io spero che cerchino un nuovo regista.

translation.en: Look, I'm just saying. There has to be a director back there,
translation.it: Senti, dico solo che dev'esserci un regista

translation.en: calling out the camera angles, the shots.
Yes, there is. His name is Vince McMahon.
Well, I think Mr. McMahon would love my ideas.
translation.it: Credo che McMahon apprezzerebbe le mie idee.

translation.en: For example, what about a match filmed entirely by drones?
translation.it: Tipo, che ne dite di un incontro ripreso dai droni?

translation.en: Look, I'm just passionate about my craft. You're not passionate about anything.
translation.it: Coltivo solo la mia passione. Voi non avete passioni.

translation.en: I'm passionate about plenty of things.
translation.it: Veramente io ne ho un sacco.
Lo snorkeling, le gare di poesia,

translation.en: wondering if Ariana Grande ever thinks her high ponytail is a little too high.
translation.it: chiedermi se Ariana Grande pensa mai di avere la coda troppo alta.

translation.en: Speaking of announcements, you gonna do it?
translation.it: A proposito di annunci, tu lo farai?

translation.en: You love it more than any of us.
No. I love WWE more than any of us.
translation.it: No. A me piace la WWE un sacco.

translation.en: Of course, little Leo won't sign up for the wrestling team.
translation.it: Il piccolo Leo non si iscrive al wrestling.

translation.en: Yeah. Of course, little Leo won't sign up for the wrestling team.
translation.it: Già. Il piccolo Leo non si iscrive.

translation.en: I, however, I'm all over this. Mason...
Does our little Leo want to be a WWE Superstar?
translation.it: Il nostro piccolo Leo vuole diventare una superstar della WWE?
Wow. Trevor, Mason e Luke che bullizzano gli altri. Che novità.

translation.en: Giving people a hard time. How shocking.
translation.it: Trevor, Mason e Luke che bullizzano gli altri. Che novità.
I New Day contro gli Usos.
Vincono i New Day, è sicuro.

translation.en: It doesn't matter. I'm picking New Day every time.
translation.it: È uguale. Io tifo sempre per i New Day.

translation.en: Trouble in Paradise is the best finishing move on the planet.
translation.it: La Trouble in Paradise è la miglior mossa finale del pianeta.

translation.en: [Caleb] I'm sorry, but that's crazy talk.
[Riyaz] What about AJ Styles' Phenomenal Forearm?
translation.it: E la Phenomenal Forearm di A. J. Styles?

translation.en: Yeah, today is not your day.
translation.it: Già. Oggi non è la tua giornata.

translation.en: You three need a hobby or something.
Uh, Leo was just educating us on the proper way to eat
translation.it: Leo ci stava solo spiegando qual è il modo giusto di mangiare

translation.en: Yeah. Isn't that right, big guy?
Well, uh... guess we better head home.
-Lots of homework to do. -Yeah. Straight A's.
[man] Hey, hey! No kids allowed without parents!
Oh, sorry, sir. We were just admiring the beautiful doors.
translation.it: Scusi, signore. Stavamo ammirando queste belle porte.

translation.en: I need you to leave now.
Are you with those other delinquents?
And what do you have there?
I found this really cool wrestling mask in this weird secret compartment.
translation.it: C'era questa bella maschera da wrestling in uno strano scrigno segreto.

translation.en: Do you know whose it was?
Because if you don't, I'll have to burn it.
What about that Ric Flair robe?
translation.it: E la vestaglia di Ric Flair?

translation.en: And don't tell anybody about the mask. You'll get me into trouble.
translation.it: E non dire a nessuno della maschera. O mi metterai nei guai.
e hashtag: che tu sia benedetto.

translation.en: Grandma's about to be an influencer, baby.
How was your day, Kid Chaos?
translation.it: Com'è andata la giornata, Kid Chaos?

translation.en: You just let me know. I'll come up to that school
and open up a can of you-know-what, okay?
translation.it: e gli apro una lattina di tu sai cosa, ok?

translation.en: 'Cause you know I'll do anything for you, babe.
translation.it: Sai che farei di tutto per te.

translation.en: I smell something. It doesn't smell right. Is that you?
translation.it: Sento un odore e non è buono. Sei tu?

translation.en: You know, I sell clothes that people have literally died in. I know that smell.
translation.it: Vendo abiti in cui la gente è fisicamente morta. Conosco quest'odore.

translation.en: Ooh, don't let him hurt that big, beautiful, sexy body.
translation.it: Non farti sciupare quel bel corpo sexy.

translation.en: Come on! Get up, Big E!
I wish I could be as strong as Kofi.
Everything would be so much better.
Believe me, kiddo. Life isn't all about being strong.
translation.it: Credimi, figliolo. Nella vita non basta essere forti.

translation.en: Mom says that all the time.
Or she did. At least, when she was here.
translation.it: Cioè lo diceva. Quando era qui.

translation.en: And just because she's not here does not mean that she doesn't love you.
translation.it: E se anche non è qui, non significa che non ti ama.

translation.en: And hey, Big E! You never forget that Grandma is here,
translation.it: Ehi, Big E! E tu non dimenticare che la nonna è qui,

translation.en: willing and ready and waiting for you, baby.
translation.it: pronta e disponibile che ti aspetta, tesoro.

translation.en: Hey, you guys. Sorry I'm late.
The garage was a mess today.
Oh, look, Dad. It's the best part.
Oh, yeah. This is where Big E makes his pecs bounce.
translation.it: Oh, sì. Adesso  Big E fa ballare i pettorali

translation.en: Up and down, up and down. Oh, my God, it drives me wild.
translation.it: su e giù, su e giù. Oh, mio Dio, mi fa impazzire.

translation.en: For the record, we have different opinions on what the best part is.
translation.it: Per la cronaca, non è la parte che intendevo io.

translation.en: Dad, remember when you said every wrestler has a weakness?
translation.it: Papà, ricordi quando hai detto che ogni wrestler ha un punto debole?

translation.en: I guess I did say that, yeah.
Well, I think Jimmy Usos' is his temper.
translation.it: Beh, credo che per Jimmy Usos sia il suo carattere.

translation.en: He ran straight into Kofi. He wasn't thinking straight.
translation.it: È andato addosso a Kofi. Non è una bella idea.

translation.en: Ooh. Look. They're about to make a big announcement.
translation.it: Stanno per fare un annuncio importante.
Universo WWE. Sono The A Lister.

translation.en: The most must-see WWE Superstar in history, The Miz,
translation.it: La più grande superstar della storia della WWE: The Miz.

translation.en: and the time has finally come.
You have a once-in-a-lifetime chance to become the next NXT Superstar.
translation.it: Hai l'occasione unica di diventare la prossima superstar di NXT.

translation.en: So if you think you have what it takes,
get your butt down to Fallbridge.
Uh... I'm sorry, hang on. Fallbridge?
The WWE is hosting a winner-take-all tournament,
translation.it: La WWE organizza un torneo all'ultimo sangue

translation.en: where two finalists will square off inside a steel cage.
translation.it: e la finale sarà in una gabbia di ferro.

translation.en: The winner will receive not only an NXT contract,
translation.it: Il vincitore non solo riceverà un contratto NXT,

translation.en: The WWE is coming right here to Fallbridge?
translation.it: La WWE verrà qui a Fallbridge?

translation.en: It was stale. I threw it out.
Dad, remember that time we went to Raw, and Mom met Becky Lynch after the show?
translation.it: Papà, ricordi quando andammo a vedere Raw e mamma incontrò Becky Lynch?

translation.en: That was a very fun time for your mother.
I have like two or three emergency sandwiches hidden in the kitchen somewhere.
translation.it: Ho due o tre panini di emergenza nascosti in cucina.

translation.en: You change the topic every time he brings up his mother,
translation.it: Cambi argomento ogni volta che parla di sua madre

translation.en: or run out to the garage and work on that car.
translation.it: o corri in garage a lavorare a quell'auto.

translation.en: Well, what happened with Rachel is a sensitive subject,
translation.it: Quello che è successo con Rachel è un argomento delicato

translation.en: and I'm just not quite sure how to broach it.
translation.it: e non so bene come affrontarlo.

translation.en: [Steve] To my credit, I only avoid talking to him
[Denise] Steve, Rachel leaving was a surprise to all of us.
translation.it: La partenza di Rachel è stata una sorpresa per tutti.

translation.en: [Steve] Can we talk about anything else? Please?
I mean, there are 1,000 things that I would rather do,
translation.it: Ci sono mille cose di cui preferirei parlare

translation.en: than talk about my wife leaving me for someone else,
translation.it: anziché di mia moglie che mi ha lasciato con sua madre

translation.en: You know, it may not mean much, but I, um...
translation.it: Sai, magari non significa molto, ma io...

translation.en: adjusted my schedule just to take a few weeks off
translation.it: ho rivoluzionato i miei piani per prendermi qualche settimana

translation.en: to come here and try to help you through this.
translation.it: e venire ad aiutarti in questa cosa.

translation.en: Look, as soon as I can pay down the bank,
translation.it: Senti, appena avrò saldato il mio debito,

translation.en: I will go from two jobs to one job,
and I will find some semblance of normalcy.
translation.it: e a una parvenza di normalità.

translation.en: But I still owe the bank like $20,000.
If I don't pay it soon, I...
translation.it: Se non li pago in fretta,

translation.en: [Denise] I told you. I'll take out a second mortgage on the store.
translation.it: Ti ho detto che metterò un'altra ipoteca sul negozio.

translation.en: [Steve] No. Come on, I can't. This is my mess. I'll clean it up.
translation.it: Non posso accettarlo. Il casino è mio e lo sistemo io.

translation.en: Although, it's almost a crime to hide this studly face from the world.
translation.it: Anche se è un crimine nascondere al mondo questo bel faccino.

translation.en: [deep-voiced] That was just you being you, big man.
You're a limousine-riding, jet-flying cool dude
translation.it: Sei un fico con la limousine, il jet privato

translation.en: [regular voice] I wet the bed until I was eight.
translation.it: A otto anni bagnavo ancora il letto.

translation.en: [deep-voiced] I wet the bed until I was eight.
translation.it: A otto anni bagnavo ancora il letto.

translation.en: [regular voice] Why did that sound so much cooler?
[deep-voiced] Are you ready to face the man of the hour?
The man with the power, the guy who's too sweet to be sour? Ooh!
translation.it: L'uomo potente, l'uomo troppo dolce per essere indecente?

translation.en: I've been all around the world rocking rings across the globe,
translation.it: Sono stato ovunque, ho fatto tremare i ring di tutto il mondo

translation.en: and I have never seen a sorrier sight than you.
translation.it: e non ho mai visto uno spettacolo più patetico di te.

translation.en: "Legend has it that this mask's mystical powers
translation.it: "La leggenda narra che i poteri magici di questa maschera

translation.en: only work for competitors who are truly deserving of its magic.
translation.it: funzionano solo con chi li merita davvero.

translation.en: The mask itself decides who is worthy.
translation.it: È la maschera stessa a decidere chi è degno.

translation.en: The mask was last seen 50 years ago."
translation.it: La maschera è stata vista l'ultima volta 50 anni fa."

translation.en: [Trevor] Your little buddy Leo ran away from us.
translation.it: Il vostro amico Leo ci è sfuggito.

translation.en: So now, we're gonna have to take out our frustrations on you two.
translation.it: Quindi sfogheremo la nostra frustrazione su voi due.

translation.en: [Trevor] I'm gonna break your face, nerd.
[Riyaz] I prefer the term "intellectually advanced person."

translation.it: Trevor, sul serio. Non è divertente.

translation.en: I think you should leave them alone.
You, however, are a different story.
But we're the ones hanging by our underwear.
translation.it: Ma siamo noi quelli appesi per le mutande.

translation.en: Second door to the left, right before the bathrooms.
translation.it: Seconda porta a sinistra, prima dei bagni.
Che ti è venuto in mente?

translation.en: They could have really hurt you.
Just promise me no more fighting. Okay?
translation.it: Promettimi che non farai più a botte, ok?

translation.en: They're bigger than you, sure, but you're stronger than them.
translation.it: Loro sono più grossi, ma tu sei più forte.

translation.en: Wow, that was really sweet, man.
You are definitely getting five stars. Yeah.
[Riyaz] That was the coolest thing ever today.
I guess that was pretty cool.
My dad didn't like it, though.
The whole school is talking about it.
It seemed physically impossible, no offense.
Tomorrow in Fallbridge, WWE kicks off its search
translation.it: Domani a Fallbridge la WWE inizierà le selezioni

translation.en: to find the next NXT Superstar.
translation.it: per trovare la nuova superstar NXT.

translation.en: But one man has already registered.
translation.it: Ma una persona si è già iscritta.

translation.en: Or should I say one monster?
translation.it: O forse dovrei dire un mostro?

translation.en: The entire WWE roster should be shaking in their boots right now,
That's me, I'm his manager. Remember that name, too.
Dude, he's huge. He's gotta be a shoo-in for that $50,000.
translation.it: È enorme. Ha i 50.000 $ già in tasca.

translation.en: [deep-voiced] All you jabronis better know your role, and stay out of my lane.
translation.it: E voialtri jabroni, state al posto vostro e non intralciatemi.

translation.en: "I came here to chew bubblegum and kick butt,
translation.it: "Sono qui per masticare gomme e dare calci in culo,

translation.en: but I'm all out of bubblegum."
No. I can't pull that one off.
Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls,
translation.it: Signore e signori, ragazzi e ragazze,

translation.en: [scoffs] Chuck E. Cheese is a block over, kid.
translation.it: Il chiosco dei gelati è di là, piccolo.

translation.en: You're a little small for this, aren't you?
translation.it: Non sei un po' troppo piccolo?
Nelle botti piccole c'è il vino buono.

translation.en: Whatever. What is your wrestling name?
translation.it: Ok. Qual è il tuo nome da wrestler?

translation.en: Okay, come on. If you wanna compete, I need a name.
translation.it: Se vuoi partecipare, mi serve un nome.

translation.en: And you should really think about changing,
Get out of my seat, you little worm.
Just ignore him, bruh. Come on.
But you can call me Smooth.
[sing-songy] and I got this silky smooth voice.
translation.it: e ho una voce calma e setosa.

translation.en: I like it. Nice to meet-- [sniffs]
It smells like old bus seats.
-["I Came to Play" by Jim Johnston] -It's on.
Who here is ready to be a Superstar?
That's right. I'm The Miz. It is my pleasure
translation.it: Bene. Io sono The Miz. È un piacere

translation.en: to welcome you to this winner-take-all NXT competition.
translation.it: darvi il benvenuto a questa gara all'ultimo sangue di NXT.

translation.en: I'll be your awesome host, watching on as we...
translation.it: Sarò il padrone di casa e vigilerò...

translation.en: ...will then have three weeks of bone-crushing bouts
translation.it: ...e affronterà tre settimane di combattimenti micidiali,

translation.en: with the final two meeting inside a steel cage--
translation.it: e i due finalisti combatteranno in una gabbia di ferro...

translation.en: Uh, sorry we're late, but I had to feed the beast.
translation.it: Scusate il ritardo, ho dovuto nutrire la bestia.

translation.en: He had four whole chickens for lunch today.
translation.it: Ha mangiato quattro polli a pranzo.

translation.en: Yeah. You should've seen the look on the chicken's faces.
Oh, my gosh. Look at this motley crew.
This is gonna be easier than I thought.
You know what? I'm just kidding.
Good luck... to none of youse.
-Are you done? -I am, yes. Thank you very much.
-[announcer] Barrel Toss. -["Reyna" by Niña Dioz playing]
Let's see how you guys are on the top rope.
translation.it: Vediamo come ve la cavate con l'altezza.

translation.en: [The Miz] Come on, big guy. Gotta go all the way to the top.
All right, Kid Chaos. Your turn to show off those skills.
translation.it: E va bene, Kid Chaos. Facci vedere di cosa sei capace.

translation.en: [The Miz] And the next finalist is...
And the last finalist moving on to the tournament is...
translation.it: E l'ultimo finalista del torneo è…

translation.en: Miz, you made the right choice.
translation.it: Miz, hai fatto la scelta giusta.

translation.en: Because I'm the best there is, the best there was,
translation.it: Io sono il migliore che c'è, il migliore che c'è stato

translation.en: and the best there ever will be.
translation.it: e il migliore che ci sarà mai.

translation.en: [Denise] So this is a stinky mask with powers. Hmm.
translation.it: Così è una maschera puzzolente con dei poteri.

translation.en: You can't tell Dad. He'll kill me.
translation.it: Non dirlo a papà. Mi ucciderebbe.

translation.en: Baby, you found a magical mask.
It's not like you got a D in science.
translation.it: Non è come una D in scienze.

translation.en: and then we can keep the house.
I overheard you and Dad talking.
translation.it: Ho sentito te e papà parlare.

translation.en: that is not your concern, okay?
translation.it: non devi preoccuparti di questo, ok?

translation.en: You're 11 years old, and I'm sure your dad will figure out a way to save the house. Or I will.
translation.it: Hai 11 anni, sono certa che tuo padre troverà il modo di salvare la casa. O io.

translation.en: But what if this is the way?
translation.it: E se fosse questo il modo?

translation.en: Not just to save the house. To fix everything.
translation.it: Non solo per la casa. Per sistemare tutto.

translation.en: Dad won't have to work so much. And who knows?
translation.it: papà non dovrà più lavorare tanto. E chissà?

translation.en: Maybe Mom will even come back.
If I let you do this...
translation.it: Se ti do il permesso di farlo,

translation.en: you cannot get hurt, or I will kill you.
translation.it: tu non farti male, altrimenti ti uccido.

translation.en: like I really am a WWE Superstar.
translation.it: se fossi davvero una superstar della WWE.

translation.en: It somehow takes what's inside of me and makes it awesome.
translation.it: Prende ciò che ho dentro e lo rende straordinario.

translation.en: Like, I can say or do anything.
translation.it: Posso dire o fare qualunque cosa.

translation.en: Just please promise me you'll be careful.
[Riyaz] Dude, where were you last night?
I still don't know who I'm rooting for.
translation.it: Non so ancora per chi tifare.
Di certo non per Samson. Fa schifo.

translation.en: Smooth Operator seems kind of cool.
I like the little guy. Kid Chaos.
translation.it: A me piace il piccolo. Kid Chaos.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. He's crazy strong for his size.
translation.it: Sì, è fortissimo per la sua stazza.

translation.en: Why don't you go talk to her?
Oh, no. I can't do that.
She's like smart and cool and popular.
translation.it: Lei è intelligente, bella e popolare.

translation.en: Then you go talk to her.
Yeah, I don't see myself doing that.

translation.it: E perché? Ti manca la passione?

translation.en: Come on, dude. You were strong enough to take on Trevor and Mason.
translation.it: Dai, amico. Se hai affrontato Trevor e Mason,

translation.en: [Kid Chaos] Some say a life without books is a life not worth living.
translation.it: Dicono che una vita senza libri non vale la pena di essere vissuta.

translation.en: Don't wanna get you sick. Wouldn't be cool.
translation.it: Non voglio attaccartelo. Non è da fichi.

translation.en: Are you kidding? I love Rick Riordan.
Have you read The Trials of Apollo?
translation.it: Hai letto Le sfide di Apollo?

translation.en: So, Erica, I've noticed we're in a few classes together.
translation.it: Erica, ho visto che abbiamo dei corsi in comune.

translation.en: I was wondering if you wanna get our study on sometime?
translation.it: Ti andrebbe di studiare con me, qualche volta?

translation.en: Um... actually, how about we talk on the phone?
I hope you are hungry [with Italian accent] because I have made for you,
translation.it: Spero che abbiate fame perché vi ho preparato

translation.en: Real authentic. I feel like I'm in Tuscany.
translation.it: Pazzesco, sembra di essere in Toscana.

translation.en: Denise... I'll ask you to hold your sarcasm, please,
translation.it: Denise, posso chiederti di risparmiarci il tuo sarcasmo?

translation.en: because clearly my son enjoys my cooking. Wow, you really...
translation.it: A mio figlio piace come cucino. Wow, hai molta…

translation.en: You're very hungry. Are you okay?
Well... I've been burning a lot of calories lately.
Must be all that brain busting I'm doing at school.
translation.it: Dev'essere tutto il brain busting che faccio a scuola.

translation.en: Well, I did piledrive you to the library yesterday.
translation.it: Beh, ieri ti ho scaraventato in biblioteca.

translation.en: My teacher got a real super kick out of me doing all that extra credit.
translation.it: L'insegnante mi ha dato un supercalcio per il credito extra.

translation.en: Well, there's no way you're gonna powerbomb your next big test.
translation.it: Non farai mai un powerbomb al tuo prossimo test.

translation.en: put the sleeper hold on the brake line of a 1988 Toyota Tercel, so...
translation.it: ho fatto una presa di sottomissione ai freni di una Toyota Tercel del 1988…
Universo della WWE. È giunto il momento.

translation.en: Our 16 competitors are jacked up and ready to do this.
translation.it: I nostri 16 concorrenti sono carichi e pronti.

translation.en: Oh, thanks, bro. How're you feeling?
I feel like I'm about to hop on a lightning bolt,
translation.it: Come uno che sta per montare un fulmine

translation.en: and ride it like a bucking bronco.
Hey! Hey! Don't you touch my baby!
translation.it: Ehi! Non toccare il mio bambino!

translation.en: That's right! Get him, baby, get him!
So good I gotta get the selfie!
Erica, good to hear from you.
Oh. Hey. What are you doing here?
I know I said I'd call, but I take dance lessons right down the street,
translation.it: So che dovevo chiamare, ma ero a danza qui vicino

translation.en: so I figured I'd just come over. Is that okay?
translation.it: e ho pensato di venire. Va bene?

translation.en: Of course, it's okay. It's fine, sweetie. [laughs]
translation.it: Ma certo. Hai fatto bene, tesoro.

translation.en: Yeah, it's totally okay. I just, uh...
Uh... give me a second, okay?
You know, that is so crazy that you're a dancer, because I'm a dancer, too.
translation.it: Che coincidenza che balli, anch'io sono una ballerina.

translation.en: Like, back in the 80s, I was a pop lock master.
translation.it: Negli anni '80 ero una maestra del pop lock.

translation.en: Oh, my God. I was so funky fresh.
translation.it: Oh, mio Dio. Ero così funky.

translation.en: Okay, she's here. In your home.
translation.it: Ok, lei è qui. A casa tua.

translation.en: Yeah, sure. But first, let's get you a drink.
translation.it: Sì, certo. Ma prima ti offro da bere.

translation.en: I'm good. I got my water.
So you want another drink to go with your water. Don't worry, I'm on it.
translation.it: Vuoi qualcosa con l'acqua? Ci penso io.

translation.en: Sorry if I was a little jumpy there.
translation.it: Scusa, sono stato un po' goffo.

translation.en: In fact, some people say I'm cool as the other side of the pillow.
translation.it: Anzi, c'è chi dice che sono come il lato fresco del cuscino.

translation.en: And since I don't want to get you sick with my cold,
translation.it: E dato che non voglio attaccarti il raffreddore,

translation.en: I think I should maybe stay in here while we work.
translation.it: penso che dovrei restare qui, mentre studiamo.

translation.en: But first, let's get you a drink.
translation.it: Ma prima ti offro da bere.

translation.en: Erica, I think this stuff is really gonna knock your socks off.
translation.it: Erica, credo che questa roba ti farà impazzire.

translation.en: Hey! Um, look who it is.
Never buy perfume off the back of a truck.
lemony and, uh, full of lemons.
They're ripe and stuff, and it's like... squeeze it.
translation.it: Sono maturi e roba così... Spremuti.

translation.en: No lassos this time, Tiny Dancer.
translation.it: Stavolta non hai un lazo, piccolino.

translation.en: I'm gonna try to touch you as little as possible,
translation.it: cercherò di toccarti il meno possibile,

translation.en: The match just started. How are you so sweaty?
translation.it: Abbiamo appena iniziato. Perché sei così sudato?

translation.en: Don't ask questions you don't want answers to.
translation.it: Non fare domande, se non vuoi risposte.
È ora di schiacciare il vermiciattolo!

translation.en: I think it's time to start cooking...
translation.it: Credo sia arrivato il momento di...

translation.en: [Smooth] So, now it's you versus me to see who takes on Samson.
translation.it: Quindi ora siamo io contro te, chi vince affronta Samson.

translation.en: [Kid Chaos] It's been a long road, huh?
I've been at this for nearly a decade.
translation.it: Lo faccio da quasi dieci anni.

translation.en: Even started training right out of college.
Whoa! You've been in it for that long?
translation.it: Wow! Lo fai da così tanto tempo?

translation.en: Yeah, I put in the time, bro.
Even had a couple tryouts for WWE.
translation.it: Ho fatto anche qualche selezione per la WWE.

translation.en: So this time, I've gotta win,
Nobody wants it more than me.
translation.it: Nessuno lo vuole più di me.

translation.en: You gonna take it easy on me out there?
Depends. Are you gonna take it easy on me?
translation.it: Dipende. Tu ci andrai piano con me?

translation.en: -Fair enough. It was worth a try. -[chuckling]
translation.it: Giusto. Ma valeva la pena tentare.

translation.en: The lighting is better over here.

translation.it: I miei follower vogliono il meglio.

translation.en: You know, at this point, your followers are pretty much 80% bot.
translation.it: Sai, ormai i tuoi follower sono all'80% dei bot.

translation.en: You're just jealous because I don't follow you back.
translation.it: Sei solo geloso perché non ti seguo.

translation.en: No, it's just a fact. We're all pretty much followed by bots.
translation.it: No, è così. Siamo tutti seguiti da bot.

translation.en: Hey, hey! How's it going, man?
I was realizing that we haven't spent much time together, you know?
translation.it: Mi sono reso conto che non passiamo molto tempo insieme.

translation.en: And... we definitely haven't had time to have a man-to-man conversation, so...
translation.it: E non abbiamo neanche avuto il tempo di parlare da uomo a uomo, perciò...

translation.en: Before yesterday, she didn't even exist.
translation.it: Fino a ieri non esisteva nemmeno.

translation.en: I had to hear about her from...

translation.it: - È la mia nuova amica. - Nuova amica?

translation.en: Well, if you really wanna have a man-to-man talk,
translation.it: Se davvero vuoi chiacchierare da uomo a uomo,

translation.en: I was thinking, and since Mom's gone and stuff--
translation.it: pensavo... da quando mamma se n'è andata...

translation.en: I do wanna have a man-to-man talk.
translation.it: Certo che voglio parlare da uomo a uomo.

translation.en: And I was thinking, too, uh, you know,
I haven't had a chance really to show you what I do, and so I was thinking,
translation.it: non ti ho mai mostrato il mio lavoro, quindi...

translation.en: God forbid you break down on the side of the road or something,
translation.it: metti che rimani fermo per strada,

translation.en: you should know what a fuel filter is.
translation.it: devi sapere cos'è un filtro carburante.

translation.en: Which is this thing right here.
I'm sorry, but can we maybe do this another time?
translation.it: Mi dispiace, possiamo farlo un'altra volta?

translation.en: I'm supposed to meet with my friends at the diner.
translation.it: Ho fissato con gli amici al diner.

translation.en: Yeah. Caleb got an A on his Spanish test.
translation.it: Sì. Caleb ha preso A a spagnolo.

translation.en: Yeah, man, go. Have fun with your friends.
translation.it: Ma certo. Divertiti con gli amici.

translation.en: When will I get to see Mom again?
Have fun. Have a good time.
What if Kid Chaos is actually just Kevin Hart in a mask,
translation.it: E se Kid Chaos fosse Kevin Hart con la maschera

translation.en: That's insane. He's not that small.
translation.it: È assurdo. Non è così basso.
Kid Chaos è alto come Leo.

translation.en: Erica, why're you hanging out with these weirdos?
translation.it: Erica… Che fai con questi strambi?

translation.en: They're not weirdos, they're my friends. And also,
translation.it: Non sono strambi, sono miei amici. E poi...

translation.en: one of them hung you up by your underpants the other day.
translation.it: uno di loro ti ha appeso per le mutande.

translation.en: So maybe you should be a little nicer.
So, wait. We're like official friends?
translation.it: Aspetta un attimo. Siamo ufficialmente amici?

translation.en: I mean, yeah. Do you guys not wanna be--
So, any of you doing the talent show?
I was gonna submit my short film, but I doubt I'll finish it in time.
translation.it: Volevo presentare il mio cortometraggio, ma dubito che finirò in tempo.

translation.en: You haven't even started it, man.
That's why I doubt I'll finish it.
Wait. Are you gonna do it?
Put your dancing lessons to use?
I don't know. It's a big crowd,
translation.it: Non lo so. Ci sarà molta gente

translation.en: and I'd be up there all alone. So...
translation.it: e io sarei da sola sul palco...

translation.en: what if I dance with you?
but if you want me to, I'll give it a try. I mean...
translation.it: ma se vuoi, ci provo. Voglio dire...

translation.en: [cashier] I am. I am. I am.
Let's go! Let's go! I ain't got all day!
translation.it: Forza! Non ho tutto il giorno!

translation.en: There's a guy robbing the place, and you're telling us not to freak out?
translation.it: C'è una rapina e ci dici di stare calmi?

translation.en: I'm sorry I didn't tell you guys before, and...
translation.it: Mi dispiace non avervelo detto prima...

translation.en: If I gotta ask you one more time, this place is gonna get messy. Let's go!
translation.it: Se dovrò chiedertelo ancora, mi toccherà fare un casino. Dai!

translation.en: See you in what, five to ten years?
translation.it: Ci vediamo tra quanto, cinque o dieci anni?

translation.en: So what made you decide to help?
That's just how the people's champ is wired.
translation.it: È quello che fa un campione.

translation.en: When I'm around, crime is down.
translation.it: Dove sono io, non c'è crimine.

translation.en: He's a hero now. [laughing] He's a hero now.
Please turn it off. Turn it off.
Can you not destroy everything you touch?
translation.it: Riesci a non distruggere tutto quello che tocchi?

translation.en: [sighs] I got that on Black Friday.
I cannot watch you eat any more butter.
translation.it: Non posso vederti mangiare altro burro.

translation.en: [laughs] You see what I did there?
You know, let me get this straight.
So Leo tries to open up to you
about his mom a little earlier, and you just...
translation.it: riguardo a sua madre e tu...
che tu non riesca a capire...
che si asciugano più in fretta...

translation.en: when they're upside down, because then the water is not in the...
translation.it: se li metti a testa in giù, perché l'acqua non rimane nel...

translation.en: [stammering] It doesn't matter, but, like, gravity is--
translation.it: Lascia perdere, ma la forza gravità è...

translation.en: Hey! Hey! Don't get mad at me.
-I'm not mad at you. -Yeah, you are.
translation.it: - Non ce l'ho con te. - Oh, sì.

translation.en: I'm mad at myself, honestly. I just...
translation.it: Sono arrabbiato con me stesso. Io...

translation.en: I don't have the answers. I don't...
translation.it: Non ho le risposte. Io non...

translation.en: know when he's going to see Rachel next, and it sucks.
translation.it: so quando rivedrà Rachel e questa cosa fa schifo.

translation.en: Well, I hate to say it, but Leo needs a little more.
translation.it: Odio dirlo, ma a Leo serve di più.

translation.en: You want me to tell him that his mom met someone else and moved to New York?
translation.it: Dovrei dirgli che sua madre ha un altro e si è trasferita a New York?

translation.en: And apparently doesn't have time to call him?
translation.it: E che, a quanto pare, non ha tempo di chiamarlo?

translation.en: You think he can handle that?
My daughter could use a little help in the mom department.
translation.it: Mia figlia non vincerà il premio di mamma dell'anno.

translation.en: And yes, she should call more.
translation.it: E sì, dovrebbe chiamare più spesso.

translation.en: It was so much easier with the two of us, and I...
translation.it: È stato molto più facile per noi due e...

translation.en: This is gonna be our new normal.
And you gotta stop running from it and hiding out here in the garage.
translation.it: E devi smetterla di scappare e di nasconderti qui in garage.

translation.en: -hiding out here in the garage. -Yes, you are.
translation.it: - mi nascondo in garage. - Sì, invece.

translation.en: Yeah, I guess... I guess I am.
Steve, his mother left, but his dad is still here.
translation.it: Steve, sua madre se n'è andata, ma suo padre è qui.

translation.en: I can't believe we're friends with a superhero.
translation.it: Incredibile, siamo amici di un supereroe.

translation.en: Or Andrew Garfield. [both] Or Tobey Maguire.
translation.it: - O Andrew Garfield. O Tobey Maguire. - Tobey Maguire.

translation.en: Dude, we're totally going to your semifinals.
translation.it: Veniamo a vedere le tue semifinali.

translation.en: We need to make t-shirts, stat.
when you talked to me in the library that day?
translation.it: quando mi hai parlato in biblioteca?

translation.en: I was just trying to make a good impression.
For the record, I prefer the real Leo.
translation.it: Per la cronaca, preferisco il vero Leo.

translation.en: And you know what? I think you kind of inspired me.
translation.it: E sai cosa? Credo che tu mi abbia ispirato.

translation.en: I think I'm gonna sign up for the talent show.
I'll take you up on that offer to dance with me.
translation.it: Accetto la tua offerta di ballare con me.

translation.en: I don't need you to do much.
Just, you know, bust a few small moves.
Small moves. I can do small moves.
translation.it: Qualche piccola mossa. Ce la farò.

translation.en: [Frankie] I almost feel sorry for her!

translation.it: Ed ecco il tuo secondo errore.

translation.en: Aw, look it. Dad said good luck tonight.
translation.it: Oh, guarda. Papà ti ha scritto "Buona fortuna".

translation.en: I mean, he meant with the talent show, but still.
translation.it: Intendeva con il talent show, ma è uguale.

translation.en: He's also taking the weekend off.
translation.it: Si è anche preso il weekend libero.

translation.en: Maybe you guys can get together and talk?
translation.it: Forse potreste stare insieme e parlare un po'?

translation.en: Yeah, sure. Maybe. I just can't think about that right now.
translation.it: Sì, certo. Forse. Adesso non posso pensarci.

translation.en: Kid Chaos is about to check into the Smackdown Hotel,
translation.it: Kid Chaos sta per entrare nello Smackdown Hotel,

translation.en: and take the elevator all the way up to the penthouse,
and do what he does best.
translation.it: e fare ciò che gli riesce meglio.

translation.en: It's almost scary how you do that.
[Kid Chaos] All the fans out there.
And they're here to see us. Crazy.
translation.it: E sono qui per vedere noi. Pazzesco.

translation.en: I've dreamed about this ever since I was ten years old.
translation.it: Sogno questo momento da quando avevo dieci anni.

translation.en: And now, our last semifinal match of the evening,
translation.it: E ora, l'ultimo incontro della semifinale di oggi,

translation.en: with the winner facing Samson next week in a steel cage.
translation.it: il cui vincitore affronterà Samson tra una settimana in una gabbia di ferro.

translation.en: ♪ No one can step to this ♪
And no one should sing like that!
You're terrible! Feast your eyes on a real man!
translation.it: Tremendo! Rifatevi gli occhi con un vero uomo!

translation.en: -Feast your eyes on a real man! -Get out of here! Beat it!
translation.it: - Rifatevi gli occhi con un vero uomo! - Vattene! Sparisci!

translation.en: Feast your eyes on that man! Half man, half mountain!
translation.it: Rifatevi gli occhi! È metà uomo e metà montagna!

translation.en: Look-- What are you looking at?
And his opponent, from right here in Fallbridge...
translation.it: E il suo avversario, di Fallbridge.

translation.en: I guess he put on his two left shoes today. [laughs]
Hey! They put something on my shoe!
translation.it: Mi hanno messo qualcosa sulla scarpa!

translation.en: [Frankie] He must've hit his head on the turnbuckle one too many times!
translation.it: Avrà sbattuto la testa una volta di troppo.

translation.en: And besides, once the bell rings, the match must go on!
translation.it: E comunque, dopo la campana l'incontro deve continuare!

translation.en: He's right. There's nothing I can do.
translation.it: Ha ragione. Non posso fare niente.

translation.en: Come on! Get up, baby, get up!
Hold him down! Hold him down!
What was that, ref? That was a fast count!
translation.it: Cos'era? Hai contato troppo in fretta!

translation.en: I did not put that stuff on my shoe.
translation.it: Non ho messo io quella roba sulla mia scarpa.

translation.en: I want everybody in this arena and at home to know something.
translation.it: Voglio che voi qui e voi a casa sappiate una cosa.

translation.en: Smooth Operator is a good man!
translation.it: Smooth Operator è una brava persona!

translation.en: I'm gonna bring a dictionary to the ring.
Because I'm going to teach Samson a new word.
translation.it: Perché insegnerò a Samson una nuova parola.

translation.en: Ah! What're you sneaking up on me like that for?
Donuts go inside. Donuts go inside to the giant man who eats everything.
translation.it: Le ciambelle sono per l'uomo gigante che mangia tutto.

translation.en: Kid Chaos. What're you doing to me?
translation.it: Kid Chaos. Cosa mi stai facendo?
Non mi piace neanche il wrestling.

translation.en: I think you literally broke the laws of physics.
translation.it: Hai infranto ogni legge della fisica.

translation.en: I mean, what else can you do in that mask?
translation.it: Cos'altro puoi fare con la maschera?

translation.en: It's not that type of magic.
translation.it: Non fa quel tipo di magia.

translation.en: Sorry to interrupt. We need you for the post-match press conference.
translation.it: Scusi l'interruzione. C'è la conferenza stampa post partita.

translation.en: You mean, another public forum to make fun of Samson?
translation.it: Intende un'altra arena su cui umiliare Samson?

translation.en: Oh, right. Can you give us a minute?
I'll leave as soon as I'm done.
It's a kid! [muffled] It's a kid. It's a kid.
All right. Well, I'll drive you kids there.
Leo, you sure you don't want us to wait with you?
translation.it: Leo, non vuoi che ti aspettiamo?

translation.en: I'm okay. Thanks, Grandma. I've gotta deal with this.
translation.it: Sto bene. Grazie, nonna. Devo fare questa cosa.

translation.en: Do not take your socks off in my car.
translation.it: Non toglierti i calzini in macchina.

translation.en: It's a magic mask. It's a magic mask.
So, Samson. How do you feel about the upcoming match?
translation.it: Allora, Samson. Come si sente riguardo l'incontro?

translation.en: -[laughing] -Are you excited to be in the finals?
translation.it: È felice di essere in finale?

translation.en: And you can quote him on that.

translation.it: Kid Chaos. Che pensa di Samson?

translation.en: Why don't you tell us what's going on in that little brain of yours, okay?
translation.it: Perché non ci dici cosa succede nel tuo cervellino, eh?

translation.en: And be sure to use your big boy voice.
translation.it: E assicurati di usare la tua voce da ragazzone.

translation.en: That's my name said three times.
translation.it: È il mio nome detto tre volte.

translation.en: Seriously, what is up with these grunts?
translation.it: Sul serio, cosa sono questi grugniti?

translation.en: [gasps] In fact, let's start with an easy one.
Now you've done and did it.
[laughs] Watch out. You got him mad now.
Samson, a man of no words, no class,
translation.it: Samson, un uomo senza parole né classe,

translation.en: All right. Oh, you shook the beehive.
Why are you grabbing me? I didn't break the table. Ow!
translation.it: Che c'entro io? Non sono stato io.

translation.en: We need you to shoot a couple of quick promos for the match. Cool?
translation.it: Dobbiamo girare qualche promo per l'incontro, ok?

translation.en: -[Frankie] All right, that's enough! -[Samson grunting angrily]
All right, I'm sorry, but calm down.
He embarrassed you. I get it.
translation.it: Ti ha messo in imbarazzo. Ok.

translation.en: But I... I have some great news.
That's right, he's just a kid.
I saw it with my own eyes.
translation.it: L'ho visto con i miei occhi.

translation.en: I don't want you to worry. Okay?
So tune in Saturday night to watch Kid Chaos
translation.it: Sintonizzatevi sabato sera e guardate Kid Chaos

translation.en: That's how you point, Rog. You see how he pointed there? You see? Uh.
translation.it: È così che si indica Rog. Visto come ha indicato?

translation.en: Miss Cartwright, could you move us to the end?
translation.it: Sig.na Cartwright, può sportarci alla fine?

translation.en: Still waiting on half your act?
Well, I'll just pop you at the end.
translation.it: Va bene, ti metto alla fine.

translation.en: [man] Kid! Can I get a selfie?
[woman] Hey, can I get a selfie?

translation.it: Qualsiasi cosa per i miei fan.

translation.en: Up next, we have Erica Bartlett and Leo Thompson.
translation.it: I prossimi sono Erica Bartlett e Leo Thompson.

translation.en: I don't know any of my friends.

translation.it: Ragazzi... mi dispiace. La conferenza stampa non finiva mai.

translation.en: The press conference just went on forever.
translation.it: mi dispiace. La conferenza stampa non finiva mai.

translation.en: They hounded me. I left as soon as I could.
translation.it: Mi hanno inseguito. Me ne sono andato il prima possibile.

translation.en: I will stay here until every last one of you gets a photo.
translation.it: Rimarrò qui finché ognuno di voi non avrà una foto.
ma Caleb ha salvato la situazione.
Ballare è la mia vera passione.

translation.en: Come on. Are you seriously mad?
Yeah. You ditched me, and this was all your idea.
translation.it: Sì. Mi hai piantata in asso, nonostante fosse stata un'idea tua.

translation.en: I know, but... I was just doing my job, okay?
translation.it: Lo so, ma... Facevo solo il mio lavoro, ok?

translation.en: I mean, it's only a talent show.
translation.it: Cioè, è solo un talent show.

translation.en: I've kind of got more important things going on right now.
translation.it: Ho cose più importanti da fare adesso.
- Beh, ciao, Kid Ego. - Come vuoi.

translation.en: Sorry that I'm Kid Chaos and you're not.
translation.it: Scusate se sono io Kid Chaos e non voi.

translation.en: No. What you are is a jerk.
Guys, I've had a long night.
translation.it: Ragazzi, è stata una lunga serata.
Amico, ci hai preso in giro.

translation.en: The only reason I messed with you
translation.it: Se vi ho preso in giro,

translation.en: is because you always mess with me,
translation.it: è solo perché voi prendete sempre in giro me,

translation.en: And if we're being honest, it does get harder again.
translation.it: E, a essere onesti, poi torna difficile.

translation.en: You know, your grandfather and I actually had a great discussion
translation.it: Sai, tuo nonno e io abbiamo discusso molto

translation.en: about how hard it is to grow up...
in the garage working on the Camaro.
I don't wanna work on the stupid car with you, Dad.
translation.it: Non voglio lavorare con te sulla stupida macchina.

translation.en: That's not really what I meant.
Dad, it is what you meant.
Because whenever things get too serious, you go and work on the car.
translation.it: Appena le cose si fanno serie, vai a lavorare alla macchina.

translation.en: I... I just wanna be alone.
Talk to me, get your mind right.
I thought the mask would make everything better.
translation.it: Pensavo che la maschera avrebbe migliorato tutto.

translation.en: I thought it was gonna fix things,

translation.it: Non hai detto che la maschera

translation.en: You know, the magical mask is not what makes you strong.
translation.it: Non è una maschera magica a renderti forte.

translation.en: Real strength comes from here... and here.
translation.it: La vera forza viene da qui... e da qui.

translation.en: Dad said something like that the other day, too.
translation.it: Anche papà ha detto una cosa simile, l'altro giorno.

translation.en: Listen, kiddo. Your dad really loves you.
translation.it: Ascolta, tuo padre ti vuole molto bene.

translation.en: And I know your mom leaving, it's been rough on you.
translation.it: So che tua madre se n'è andata e che per te è dura.

translation.en: It's been hard on me, too.
I gotta tell you, it hasn't been easy on your dad, either.
translation.it: E devo dirtelo, non è facile neanche per tuo padre.

translation.en: When you came on stage, I had no clue what was gonna happen.
translation.it: Quando sei salito sul palco, non sapevo cosa avresti fatto.

translation.en: [Caleb] Yeah, I've been watching you guys rehearse,
translation.it: Sì, vi ho guardato fare le prove,

translation.en: so I knew most of it.
I'm pretty vigilant. It was mostly freestyle.
translation.it: Sono molto attento. Era per lo più freestyle.

translation.en: I was a jerk, and you're my best friends.
translation.it: Sono stato un idiota e voi siete i miei migliori amici.

translation.en: I let all this stuff go to my head.
Yeah. We've been talking, and we've decided,
you can't really judge a man until you've walked a mile in his mask.
translation.it: che non puoi giudicare qualcuno se non hai indossato la sua maschera.
E poi, sono un gran ballerino.

translation.en: I know that seems unrelated, but still,
translation.it: Sembra che non c'entri, ma insomma.

translation.en: So, do you still wanna come--
[Corey Graves] WWE Universe, tonight is the night.
translation.it: Universo della WWE, finalmente ci siamo.

translation.en: Two rookies will do battle inside of a 16-foot-high steel cage,
translation.it: Due esordienti lotteranno in una gabbia di ferro alta quattro metri

translation.en: vying not only for an NXT contract,
translation.it: per contendersi non solo un contratto NXT,

translation.en: And one of them might even die.
No. No one's gonna die. That's--
I'm sorry. Have you seen the size of Kid Chaos?
translation.it: Scusa tanto, ma hai visto la taglia di Kid Chaos?

translation.en: But the action is gonna be incredible.

translation.it: Indovinate chi ha del cibo cinese?

translation.en: So, how're you feeling, Kid Chaos?
translation.it: Allora, come ti senti, Kid Chaos?

translation.en: Good. I just wish Dad could be here.
translation.it: Bene. Vorrei solo che papà fosse qui.

translation.en: Okay, okay! Everybody ready for a big night?
translation.it: Ok! Pronti per una grande serata?

translation.en: Hey, hey, get out of here!
There he is. Don't worry. Your secret's safe with us, okay?
translation.it: Tranquillo. Il tuo segreto è al sicuro con noi, ok?

translation.en: Yeah, it is. Go get something to eat.
translation.it: Sì. Vai a prendere da mangiare.

translation.en: I'm not here to start any trouble, I come in peace.
translation.it: non voglio creare problemi, vengo in pace.

translation.en: We're all competitive people, okay? It's human nature.
translation.it: Siamo tutti competitivi, ok? È la natura umana.

translation.en: Yeah. Things got a little out of hand.
translation.it: La cosa ci è sfuggita di mano.

translation.en: I'm sorry, okay? We're both sorry.
translation.it: che ti chiedo scusa. Ci dispiace.

translation.en: Anyway, congratulations on making it this far, okay?
translation.it: Comunque, congratulazioni per essere arrivato fin qui, ok?

translation.en: May the best man, or kid, win.
translation.it: Che vinca il migliore, uomo o bambino che sia.

translation.en: [Frankie] Come on. Give him his space.
Come on. You gotta warm up, anyway.
Nice delivery, but I ain't buying it.
translation.it: Bel tentativo, ma non me la bevo.

translation.en: So, I went to the thrift store the other day,
translation.it: L'altro giorno sono andata al negozio dell'usato,

translation.en: It wasn't as nice as my vintage shop,
translation.it: Non è bello come il mio negozio vintage,

translation.en: but I was able to pick out a few pieces,
translation.it: ma sono riuscita a trovare qualche pezzo
e a fare la mia magia.

translation.en: Huh? Huh? What do you think about this?

translation.it: - Dovevamo prendere i popcorn. - Lo so.

translation.en: I didn't think you'd make it.
Come on, man. You know I'd never miss a cage match.
translation.it: Non mi perderei mai un incontro in gabbia.
Date il benvenuto al primo sfidante,

translation.en: I'm not worthy. I'm not worthy, Samson!
♪ I'm always ready We're always ready ♪
translation.it: KID CHAOS È IL NOSTRO UOMO

translation.en: You mean to tell me that this guy is taking on that guy?
translation.it: Vuoi dirmi che questo tizio sfiderà quell'altro tizio?

translation.en: What am I missing here? Am I missing something?
translation.it: Che mi sono perso? Mi sono perso qualcosa?

translation.en: I know how it looks, but,
Kid Chaos has been crushing guys twice his size.
translation.it: Kid Chaos ha battuto gente che era il doppio di lui.

translation.en: [announcer] And finally, your very special guest referee,
Come on, Red! Call it right, Red! Call it right!
translation.it: Vai, arbitro! Fai le cose per bene, arbitro!

translation.en: Keep it fair. Keep it fair.
Only one will emerge a WWE NXT Superstar.
translation.it: Ma solo uno diventerà una superstar NXT della WWE.

translation.en: What is this? Kid Chaos unmasked!
translation.it: Ma che succede? Kid Chaos senza maschera!

translation.en: I told you someone was gonna die.
translation.it: Te l'ho detto che qualcuno moriva.

translation.en: Okay, Samson. Put the mask on.
Come on, let's go. Pull it down.
Use your muscles! Suck in your cheek.
translation.it: Usa i muscoli! Strizza le guance.

translation.en: Does anybody have any petroleum jelly?
Listen, Samson. Let's... Let's work something out.
if you don't beat me up now,
maybe I'll teach you how to talk.
New plan. If you don't kill me,
translation.it: Cambio di programma. Se non mi uccidi,

translation.en: I'll introduce you to some new people,
help you make a new friend.
translation.it: ti aiuterò a farti un amico.
Perché ne hai bisogno. E tanto.

translation.en: That's not very nice, am I right?
translation.it: Non è una cosa carina, vero?

translation.en: Hey, Samson, leave him alone. He's just a kid.
translation.it: Lascialo in pace, Samson! È solo un ragazzino.

translation.en: He's trying to escape! He's trying to escape! Get him, Samson!
[Sheamus] Put him down! Put him down!
Stay up there, baby. Stay up there.
Hey! I said he's just a kid.
translation.it: Ehi! Ho detto che è solo un ragazzino.

translation.en: Back off, Samson. I'm the official here.
translation.it: Stai indietro, Samson. Sono io che comando.

translation.en: Samson, get up there! Get that mask!
Samson, he's going for the mask! Get the mask!
translation.it: Samson, sta arrivando alla maschera! Prendila!

translation.en: If he gets the mask before us, we're done!
translation.it: Se ci arriva prima lui, siamo spacciati!

translation.en: Get the mask! You gotta get up there before him!
translation.it: Prendi la maschera! Devi farlo prima di lui!

translation.en: Get up there and get the mask!
translation.it: Vai su e prendi la maschera!

translation.en: Leo, get down here! This is your dad!
No-- You're right. Security. It's fine. We're gonna--
Leo, get down! I'm his dad! I'm his dad!
Dad, what are you doing here?
What am I do-- Leo, what are you doing here?
translation.it: Cosa ci faccio... Cosa ci fai tu qui?

translation.en: That being said, I think you're gonna be okay.
Yes. Remember how I told you every superstar has a weakness?
translation.it: Ricordi che ti ho detto che ogni superstar ha un punto debole?

translation.en: He's sweating. Look at his hands! They're practically trembling!
translation.it: Suda. Guarda le mani. Quasi tremano.

translation.en: he refused to jump off the top rope.
translation.it: si è rifiutato di saltare dalla corda più alta.

translation.en: -That's because he has… -[both] A fear of heights!
[Frankie] Fear of heights? Are you guys crazy?
Fear of heights? This guy loves heights!
He talks about heights all the time. He...
He climbed Mount Everest last year, so...

translation.it: - Hai paura? - Samson, continua a salire!

translation.en: Keep climbing or I will send you back to that circus in Sheboygan!
translation.it: Continua a salire o ti rispedisco al circo di Sheboygan!

translation.en: If you really wanna be the next NXT Superstar,
translation.it: Se vuoi essere la prossima superstar NXT,

translation.en: you know someday you'll have to get past this.
So, why don't you do it now? Right now?
Look down, Samson. I dare you.
Did you see that? Oh, my God!
[Steve] I told you that's my son!
translation.it: È mio figlio, vi ho detto!
Oh, mio Dio! Ce l'hai fatta!

translation.en: I'm so sorry about all this.
And I'm sorry for what I said.
translation.it: E mi dispiace per quello che ho detto.

translation.en: No, it's okay. You were right.
And I should have told you...
about Mom and everything. It's just...
translation.it: della mamma e di tutto il resto. Solo...

translation.en: It makes me sad, and so I was scared that you would be sad, too. But...
translation.it: Mi rende triste e non volevo che anche tu fossi triste. Ma...

translation.en: I have to be brave, just like you.
And neither of us needs a magical mask to do that.
translation.it: E non ci serve nessuna maschera magica.

translation.en: There's one thing that you can always, always count on.
translation.it: C'è una cosa su cui puoi sempre contare.

translation.en: And that's I'm not going anywhere.
translation.it: Io non me ne andrò mai.

translation.en: One for the books, Kid Chaos!
Or should I call you Leo?
Eleven and a half, technically, but yeah.
translation.it: Undici e mezzo, tecnicamente, comunque sì.

translation.en: Leo, how did you do it?
at the end of the day,
I had some really great people in my corner.
translation.it: avevo persone fantastiche al mio fianco.

translation.en: We can't have an 11-year-old wrestling in WWE, can we?
translation.it: Non può esserci un wrestler di 11 anni nella WWE, giusto?

translation.en: That's correct. We cannot have an 11-year-old
wrestling in the WWE. It's not safe. He's not allowed to do it.
translation.it: nella WWE. Non sarebbe sicuro. Non è permesso.
Probabilmente non è una buona idea.

translation.en: But I have a way we can fix this.
translation.it: Ma io so come rimediare al problema.

translation.en: Since I won, how about I pick my replacement?
translation.it: Dato che ho vinto, posso scegliere io il mio sostituto?

translation.en: Do you have someone in mind?
He's wanted this ever since he was my age.
translation.it: Lo desiderava da quando aveva la mia età.

translation.en: Leo, there's just one thing left to do.
translation.it: Leo, c'è solo un'altra cosa da fare.

translation.en: I don't think so, you little brat!
Hold on. Let me take a picture!
[crowd chanting] Leo! Leo! Leo! [continues] Leo! Leo! Leo!
All right, boys, bring it in. Shake hands,
and give me a good, clean match.
Let's see how well you do without the mask, Leo.
translation.it: Vediamo come te la cavi senza maschera, Leo.

translation.en: Well, let me get a quick selfie with the winner for the 'gram.
translation.it: Fammi fare un selfie veloce con il vincitore, per il Gram.

translation.en: And I mean Instagram, not the other G word.
That was a brave thing you did.
I had to come congratulate you myself.
And you must be the proud father?
translation.it: Tu devi essere il papà orgoglioso?

translation.en: Got nothing to say? I have never seen that before. [scoffs]
translation.it: È senza parole. Non era mai successo.

translation.en: Well, the pleasure is mine, Denise.
Hey, man, I gotta be honest.
I didn't think you could pull it off.
But I'm so glad that you proved me wrong.
And it's too bad you can't join us in the WWE.
translation.it: Peccato che tu non possa unirti a noi nella WWE.

translation.en: What're you talking about? I'll see you in ten years, Kofi.
translation.it: Ma che dici? Ci vediamo fra dieci anni, Kofi.

translation.en: And then, I'll show you the true meaning of impressive.
translation.it: A quel punto ti mostrerò cosa significa essere grandi.

translation.en: Did you just see that? He kissed...
